mapper.select: SELECT 時給契約.適用開始日 as startDate, 時給契約.時給 as hourlyWage, 時給契約.時間外割増率 as overTimeExtraRate, 時給契約.深夜割増率 as midnightExtraRate FROM 給与.時給契約 as 時給契約 WHERE 時給契約.従業員ID = #{employeeNumber.value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 給与.時給契約(従業員ID, 適用開始日, 時給, 時間外割増率, 深夜割増率) VALUES (#{employeeNumber.value}, #{startDate.value}, #{wageCondition.baseHourlyWage.value.value}, #{wageCondition.overTimeExtraRate.value.value.value}, #{wageCondition.midnightExtraRate.value.value.value})
